replies.body: Rod PvP is great, maybe add it to sg, but when it comes to nebula and all that stuff rods are gonna bring a stalemate that will want to make you smash your computer to bits. There's way to much voids in maps for rods to actually be fun to use, you would need to have no void at all on the map to allow rods (That includes the borders to not fall out).
replies.body_tagged: Rod PvP is great, maybe add it to sg, but when it comes to nebula and all that stuff rods are gonna bring a stalemate that will want to make you smash your computer to bits. There's way to much voids in maps for rods to actually be fun to use, you would need to have no void at all on the map to allow rods (That includes the borders to not fall out).
